China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 2 月 26 日星期一晚上 8:57:15 120
Iran's uranium stock enriched to 60% shrinks but problems persist -IAEA papers sayIran's stock of uranium enriched to near weapons-grade has shrunk, bringing it below the theoretical threshold at which it could produce three atom bombs, but problems with inspectors persist, reports by the U.N. nuclear watchdog said on Monday. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 18:00:22 GMT JHSYNBYCGJKQ7H7MJXO27I5MQA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-uranium-stock-enriched-60-shrinks-problems-persist-iaea-papers-say-2024-02-26/Francois Murphy世界中东地区
Exclusive: Treasury says US warning to banks slows Russia financial flowsWashington's threat to hit foreign financial institutions with sanctions has made a significant difference in financial flows between Russia and countries such as Turkey, the United Arab Emirates and Kazakhstan, said Deputy Treasury Secretary Wally Adeyemo. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 17:34:23 GMT TW6CB3UBEBPLJJEBEFJ5CPPAOE https://www.reuters.com/world/treasury-says-us-warns-banks-slows-Russia-financial-flows-2024-02-26/Daphne Psaledakis, David Lawder, Andrea Shalal世界
US Chamber of Commerce chief visiting China this week, spokesperson saysThe chief executive of the U.S. Chamber of Commerce, Suzanne Clark, is leading a delegation of former U.S. government officials to Beijing this week, the group said. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 17:22:03 GMT第477章https://www.reuters.com/world/us-chamber-of-commerce-chief-visiting-china-this-week-spokesperson-says-2024-02-26/Reuters世界
China expresses 'solemn' concerns over US tariffs, Taiwan in Abu Dhabi talksChina's commerce minister Wang Wentao expressed the country's "solemn concerns" over U.S. tariffs and Taiwan-related issues in the economic and trade fields on Monday when meeting with U.S. Trade Representative Katherine Tai. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 14:37:22 GMT F4F6RLAPNBI53NSANXFCW6JIBY https://www.reuters.com/world/china-expresses-solemn-concerns-over-us-tariffs-taiwan-abu-dhabi-talks-2024-02-26/Reuters世界
China's latest Long March rocket to debut in year of record missionsChina's Long March 12, capable of sending bigger satellites with more functionalities into the Earth's orbit, is expected to make its debut flight in 2024, in a year of record launch missions for the country, state media reported on Monday. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 13:23:29 GMT LOGL6JGRJVL5TOJ7IA5TZVDFSM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-latest-long-march-rocket-debut-year-record-missions-2024-02-26/Reuters世界中国
Amer Sports rises as brokerages start coverage with focus on China demandAmer Sports shares rose as much as 3.5% on Monday as analysts initiated coverage with largely bullish ratings and highlighted strong demand for the Wilson tennis racket maker's premium outdoor and sportswear products in China. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 12:43:40 GMT CWC6OMJPMNKMDBGOM53WWBZBPM https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/amer-sports-jumps-brokerages-start-coverage-with-eye-china-demand-2024-02-26/Ananya Mariam Rajesh商业零售与消费品
